page.title: 06Rhynie Gala
page.content: The Rhynie Gala takes place every year when we get our summer holidays. In the Rhynie Gala things take place like football, races, tug of war, and games. There has been two Rhynie Galas. The third Rhynie Gala will take place in about 6 weeks. Last year the football teams were trying to win the little medals and the team that won was Rhynie Rovers and after the football that day Rhynie Rovers were playing Lumsden and Rhynie Rovers won. After that we went over to the Army and showed the people pictures of helicopters and at the end of the Gala the people who won something had to go up and collect it and at night we had a dance.
